revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=WatchGuard |model=Firebox T50 |revision=(BS5AE7) |asin=B0174X9N5S |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |availability=EoL (12/31/2022) |type=router, security appliance |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_poe=af/at |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=P1020 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320EBTI-70G |fla2=8 GiB |fla2_brand=Apacer |fla2_model=SD Card |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC512M8DN-DI |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1512 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1512 |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6171R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=6 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2-Wire RTC;Seiko;S-35390A;;1;,,, RS-232 transciever;Intersil;ICL3243E;;1;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-817;;1;,,, USB 2.0 (Hi-Speed) PHY;SMSC;USB3300;;1;,,, 2K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24C02C;;1;,,, 1A 36V Buck LED Driver;Diodes Inc;AL8807;;1;,,, Mixed-Signal Microcontroller;TI;MSP430G2303;;1;,,, 3A 150V P-Channel QFET;Fairchild;FDMC2523P;;1;,,, Octal Transparent D-Type Latch;TI;SN74LVC373A;;1;,,, 60V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4850EY;;1;,,, 150V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4848DY;;1;,,, Clock Generator for PCI Express;PhaseLink;PL602-21SC;;1;,,, SPI Interface Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3205;;1;,,, Low-Power Quad-Channel Digital Isolator;Skyworks;Si8641;;1;,,, 4.5-18V 5A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54527;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller & Card Reader;Alcor Micro;AU6259;;1;,,, Advanced Current-Mode Active-Clamp PWM Controller;TI;UCC2897A;;1;,,, 802.3af/at PoE Powered Device 1-port PSE Manager;Microsemi;PD69101;;1; |flags=PoE, SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, power switch, heatsink |stock_boot=U-Boot;2010.12; |stock_os=Linux;3.12.19-rt30; |default_ip=10.0.1.0 |default_user=admin |default_pass=readwrite |oui_eth=00:90:7F }} {{TagLine|WatchGuard Firebox T50}} :[https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/hardware%20guides/Firebox_T30_T50_Hardware_Guide.pdf Hardware Guide] {{â€¢}} [https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/quick_start_guides/QSG_Firebox_T30_T50.pdf Quick Start Guide] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' ([[NXP]]) P1020 ''PowerPC'' (@800MHz) *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 4MB SPI Flash, 8GB SD Card *Network: 7x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 48V, 1.25A via barrel ==Images== File:WatchGuard Firebox T50 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:WatchGuard Firebox T50 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] ---- __NOTOC__
